bibl.title: The Melitian Schism: Coptic Christianity and the Egyptian Church.
bibl.note: Diss. Ohio State Univ. Summary in DA 50 (1989-1990) p. 1770-A. - Analysis of the Melitian schism and its relationship to the fourth-century Egyptian Church.
Scott T. Carroll, The Melitian Schism: Coptic Christianity and the Egyptian Church.
